Hi!
For the next time, you only pull the white sugar doe. The red is left to cool transparent. So when the white doe is rolled out you take the red transparent sugar and lay it like strips over the white doe lengthways. Then it’s time to twist it and you get the twisted pattern. You did not doing anything wrong the first time. You have to work the doe until crack hard, if it’s to warm it going to run out. This is the way we do it in Sweden. Think it would be easier and funnier if you try to do as many polka dots you can from a a batch.
Thanks for a super program! Watching you always!❤️
